item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple needs a Snow Sequoia (511 points | 349 comments)
2. A decompilation and port of Sonic Advance 2-a GameBoy Advance game written in C (86 points | 6 comments)
3. Giant, fungus-like organism may be a completely unknown branch of life (64 points | 16 comments)
4. Things I would have told myself before building an autorouter (126 points | 22 comments)
5. How to Use Em Dashes (–), En Dashes (–), and Hyphens (-) (309 points | 247 comments)
6. Tracing the thoughts of a large language model (672 points | 260 comments)
7. A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices (136 points | 21 comments)
8. Using uv and PEP 723 for Self-Contained Python Scripts (89 points | 16 comments)
9. Arctic sea ice sets a record low maximum in 2025 (90 points | 49 comments)
10. I tried making artificial sunlight at home (310 points | 159 comments)
11. Every Flop Counts: Scaling a 300B LLM Without Premium GPUs (32 points | 1 comment)
12. Learning Theory from First Principles [pdf] (122 points | 13 comments)
13. Most promoted and blocked domains on Kagi (239 points | 111 comments)
14. I genuinely don't understand why some people are still bullish about LLMs (310 points | 559 comments)
15. Golang on the Playstation 2 (76 points | discuss)
16. Helpcare AI (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
17. Signal Chat Leak Angers U.S. Military Pilots (42 points | 18 comments)
18. Launch HN: Continue (YC S23) – Create custom AI code assistants (151 points | 99 comments)
19. Create Weird Fun PHPStan Rules Like Nobody's Watching (3 points | discuss)
20. Anti-Orbit Laser Submarines (2017) (33 points | 5 comments)
21. Better Shell History Search (38 points | 18 comments)
22. Abundance isn't going to happen unless politicians are scared of the status quo (195 points | 305 comments)
23. First-of-its-kind trial enables paralysed man to stand via stem cell injection (149 points | 26 comments)
24. Dagger: A shell for the container age (157 points | 92 comments)
25. Clean, a formal verification DSL for ZK circuits in Lean4 (65 points | 2 comments)
26. We are building the next DocuSign (41 points | 48 comments)
27. Emacs Solo: A Surprise System Crafters Live Demo (62 points | 3 comments)
28. Asking good questions is harder than giving great answers (101 points | 15 comments)
29. The Unbearable Loudness of Chewing (62 points | 40 comments)
30. LibreOffice downloads on the rise as users look to avoid subscription costs (101 points | 57 comments)
